body:
It looks like autodiff support for aten::cat was never enabled so this code doesn't do anything. You can enable it by adding an entry in differentiableops to enable this and test your changes: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/a72603f8f8ffdd77a826129b18e839df3fe3a109/torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp#L27

or comment out these lines, file an issue, and maybe someone else will come along to handle it.
body_html:
It looks like autodiff support for aten::cat was never enabled so this code doesn't do anything. You can enable it by adding an entry in differentiableops to enable this and test your changes:

pytorch/torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp

Line 27 in a72603f

static OperatorSet differentiable_ops = {

or comment out these lines, file an issue, and maybe someone else will come along to handle it.
